title: Linux watch Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the powerful Linux watch command and its practical applications, including monitoring system processes and tracking file changes.

meta.title: Linux watch Command with Practical Examples

verify.name: Verify the watch command is working
verify.hint: Please make sure you have executed the command `watch -n 5 df -h` in your terminal.

verify.name: Verify the watch command is monitoring system processes
verify.hint: Please make sure you have executed the command `watch -n 5 'ps aux'` in your terminal.

verify.name: Verify the watch command is monitoring file changes
verify.hint:
Please make sure you have executed the commands:
1. `watch -n 5 'ls -l ~/project/files'`
2. `watch -n 5 'cat ~/project/files/file1.txt'`
in your terminal.
